companies_with_news.name: ADANIPORTS LTD
companies_with_news.text:
On August 23, 2025, a significant corporate development for Adani Ports and Special Economic Zone (ADANIPORTS) occurred in the state of Kerala, though it was not announced by ADANIPORTS on August 24 . No significant corporate news originating from ADANIPORTS was identified for August 24, 2025.

Corporate development on August 23, 2025:

Kerala Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan inaugurated the work on the Adani Logistics Park in Kalamassery, Kochi, a project that is being developed as part of the state's "Invest in Kerala" initiative.

The $600 million project is being built on 70 acres and is expected to create 1,500 direct jobs. It aims to boost Kerala's logistics and industrial sectors by attracting more micro, small, and medium enterprises (MSMEs).

The park will serve sectors like e-commerce, fast-moving consumer goods (FMCG), and automobiles.

companies_with_news.name: BAJAJ-AUTO LTD
companies_with_news.text: On August 24, 2025, there is news related to Bajaj Auto and Niti Aayog regarding a meeting about electric motorcycles . There is also information that Bajaj Auto resumed supplies of its e-scooter, Chetak, according to a corporate news report. This was also reported to be due to overcoming global constraints on rare earth magnet availability, with production being restored ahead of schedule.

companies_with_news.name: BHARTIARTL LTD
companies_with_news.text:
Based on the available search results, the most significant corporate development for Bharti Airtel Ltd on 24 August 2025 was the release of the Sustainability Report for FY 2024-25 by Nxtra Data Limited , a subsidiary of Bharti Airtel.

This report, announced on 24 August 2025 at 07:03 PM IST, provides insights into Nxtra's sustainability initiatives and performance during the fiscal year.

While other news and announcements related to Bharti Airtel were published around this date, the sustainability report stands out as the primary substantial corporate development for the company on 24 August 2025. This information is based on the search results from reputable sources such as The Economic Times and Moneycontrol.

No other significant corporate developments or business updates were identified for Bharti Airtel Ltd on 24 August 2025 based on the provided search results.

companies_with_news.name: COALINDIA LTD
companies_with_news.text:
According to searches on corporate announcements and stock market news portals, on August 24, 2025, COALINDIA Ltd. entered into a significant Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) .

Significant corporate development on August 24, 2025

New MoU signed:Coal India Limited (CIL) announced an MoU with the Mineral Resources Development, Government of Madhya Pradesh, and the Madhya Pradesh State Mining Corporation Limited. This development was published as a notice to the stock exchanges (BSE) on August 24, 2025.

companies_with_news.name: HDFCBANK LTD
companies_with_news.text:
Multiple financial news outlets reported on Sunday, August 24, 2025, about HDFC Bank's upcoming 1:1 bonus share issue . This corporate action was announced by the board of directors on July 19, with the record date set for August 27, 2025.

Key details reported on August 24, 2025:

1:1 Bonus Issue:HDFC Bank would issue one additional share for every share held by eligible investors.

Record Date:August 27, 2025.

Ex-Date:August 26, 2025, as the 27th is a market holiday.

Interim Dividend:The bank's board had also approved a special interim dividend of Rs 5 per equity share.

Financial Context:These actions followed a strong Q1 FY26 financial performance, which included a 12.2% increase in standalone net profit year-over-year.

companies_with_news.name: ICICIBANK LTD
companies_with_news.text:
On August 24, 2025, ICICI Bank made the following significant corporate announcement :

For context, note that the search results also showed a later news item on August 28, 2025, about a change in senior management, with the Group Chief Compliance Officer taking early retirement.

ESOP allotment: The company allotted 994,464 equity shares under its Employees Stock Option Scheme-2000.

companies_with_news.name: INDUSINDBK LTD
companies_with_news.text:
On August 24, 2025, IndusInd Bank Ltd. announced the reaffirmation of its credit ratings by CRISIL Ratings Limited.

Key Details of the Credit Rating Reaffirmation:

Long-term rating:CRISIL reaffirmed the long-term rating on IndusInd Bank's debt instruments at'CRISIL AA+' with a Negative outlook.

Removal of Rating Watch:The 'Rating Watch with Negative Implications' was removed.

Short-term rating:The short-term rating was reaffirmed at 'CRISIL A1+'.

AA+ Rating:Instruments with this rating are considered to have a high degree of safety regarding timely servicing of financial obligations and carry very low credit risk.

Negative Outlook:Indicates potential future downward revision of the rating.

Rating Watch Removal:Signifies the resolution of uncertainties that led to the earlier placement under Rating Watch.

The reaffirmation of the AA+ rating, while maintaining a Negative outlook, provides insights into CRISIL's assessment of IndusInd Bank's creditworthiness.

Investors should consider the Negative outlook and closely monitor future developments impacting the bank's performance.

companies_with_news.name: ITC LTD
companies_with_news.text:
As of August 30, 2025, there is no significant corporate news reported for ITC Ltd specifically from August 24, 2025, beyond routine market commentary .

Searches across various financial news sources did not reveal any substantial business updates or corporate developments for ITC Ltd on that particular date. Information retrieved for dates surrounding August 24 includes:

Acquisition approval: On August 26, ITC sought Competition Commission of India (CCI) approval to acquire the pulp and paper business of Aditya Birla Real Estate Ltd (ABREL).

Brokerage commentary: On August 25, JM Financial initiated coverage on the demerged ITC Hotels business with a "sell" rating.

Quarterly results: The company's Q1 FY26 results were released on August 1, which contained details about performance, including a strong showing from the agri business, but pressure on margins in other segments.

Employee stock allotment: A notification was made on August 19 regarding the allotment of shares under the employee stock option schemes.

companies_with_news.name: JSWSTEEL LTD
companies_with_news.text:
According to search results, on August 24, 2025, JSW Steel announced a schedule for a meeting with analysts and institutional investors . No other substantial corporate developments or business updates were published on this specific date. Significant news did appear in the surrounding days.

Analyst/Investor Meet:JSW Steel released an intimation about an upcoming meeting with analysts and institutional investors.

August 25, 2025:JSW Steel received a ₹1,472.69 crore demand notice from the Odisha government over a shortfall in iron ore dispatch from the Jajang mine.

August 25, 2025:JSW Steel incorporated a new subsidiary, APJSW Private Limited, for an iron ore project in Andhra Pradesh, with an initial project cost of ₹1,075 crore.

August 23, 2025:The company signed a non-binding Heads of Agreement with South Korea's POSCO to explore setting up a 6 MTPA integrated steel plant in India.

August 18, 2025:JSW Steel and POSCO formally signed a Heads of Agreement for a potential 6 MTPA integrated steel plant in India.

companies_with_news.name: LT LTD
companies_with_news.text:
LT Ltd had several significant corporate updates on August 24, 2025:

L&T's Chairman and Managing Director, S.N. Subrahmanyan, stated that private capital expenditure is now a substantial part of the company's order book. He highlighted a strategic focus on growth through record orders, rising private capex, aiming for a $100 billion valuation, global projects, and expanding services, technology, and financial businesses.

Subrahmanyan also noted that the Indian government's decision to rationalize Goods and Services Tax (GST) is a positive development for L&T. He emphasized that private investment is returning strongly, which is a positive shift from the pandemic period when orders were largely driven by government and multilateral projects.

companies_with_news.name: M&M LTD
companies_with_news.text:
On August 24, 2025, Mahindra & Mahindra announced plans to scout for land to set up a greenfield manufacturing plant . This expansion is intended to increase production capacity for both domestic and export markets.

Additional details from the announcement:

The new plant is in addition to the company's existing capacity expansion plans for its Chakan facility.

The announcement highlighted the unveiling of the new modular, multi-energy "NU IQ" platform, which will support a new range of SUVs, with the first rollout expected in 2027.

The multi-energy platform was engineered to address market gaps in both India and globally.

companies_with_news.name: NTPC LTD
companies_with_news.text:
On August 24, 2025, NTPC Ltd. had one significant corporate development .

Commercial operation of new solar capacity: NTPC Green Energy Limited (NGEL), a subsidiary of NTPC, announced the commercial operation date (COD) for a new 50 MW solar project in Bhuj, Gujarat.

Project details: The new capacity is part of a larger 150 MW solar project.

Impact on total capacity: This addition increases the NGEL Group's installed capacity to 7,247.58 MW and the NTPC Group's total installed capacity to 83,341 MW.

companies_with_news.name: SBIN LTD
companies_with_news.text:
Substantial Corporate Developments for SBIN Ltd on August 24, 2025 Substantial Corporate Developments for SBIN Ltd on August 24, 2025

On August 24, 2025, the Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) registered a case against Reliance Communications Limited (RCom), its former director Anil D. Ambani, and others. This follows a complaint lodged by State Bank of India (SBI) alleging a wrongful loss of ₹2,929.05 crore to the bank.

The CBI conducted searches at two locations in Mumbai based on the SBI complaint, which alleged criminal conspiracy, misrepresentation of facts, and diversion of loan funds by RCom.

The case was instituted by the CBI on August 21, based on the complaint from a Mumbai branch of SBI.

The State Bank of India had previously, in June, also classified the loan accounts of RCom and its promoters as "fraudulent".

companies_with_news.name: TATAMOTORS LTD
companies_with_news.text:
As of August 30, 2025, there is no significant corporate news reported for Tata Motors Ltd. specifically on August 24, 2025 . News from surrounding dates focused on other corporate updates, not events occurring on that day itself.

Significant corporate developments for surrounding dates include:

Demerger updates:On August 25, 2025, the National Company Law Tribunal (NCLT) sanctioned the composite scheme of arrangement for Tata Motors, enabling the demerger of its commercial and passenger vehicle businesses. The company expects the demerger to be effective by October 1, 2025.

New product launch (commercial):On August 23, 2025, Tata Motors, in partnership with its distributor DIMO, launched 10 new commercial vehicles in Sri Lanka.

New product launch (passenger):On August 24, 2025, it was reported that Tata Motors plans to launch four new SUVs by November 2025, including the Sierra EV, a Punch facelift, and petrol variants of the Harrier and Safari.

Market re-entry:On August 23, 2025, Tata Motors re-entered the South African market with several models.

companies_no_news.name: EICHERMOT LTD
companies_no_news.text:
No significant corporate developments for EICHERMOT Ltd on.

While there were no specific corporate developments for EICHERMOT Ltd on August 24, 2025, it's worth noting some broader industry context and recent news related to the company from the days surrounding this date.

EICHERMOT Ltd Recent Highlights (Surrounding August 24, 2025)

Broader Automotive Sector Context (July 2025)

Strong Performance in Q1FY26:Eicher Motors reported a 9% year-on-year rise in net profit for the first quarter of fiscal year 2026, reaching ₹1,205 crore. This growth was primarily driven by robust sales in the Royal Enfield and VECV segments.

Royal Enfield Sales Growth:The company's performance was significantly boosted by strong sales within its Royal Enfield motorcycle division.

Optimistic Outlook:Eicher Motors' management expressed optimism about continued growth in the foreseeable future.

Analyst Target Price Increase:Following the Q1FY26 results, Avendus, a financial services firm, raised its target price for Eicher Motors to ₹5,850. This increase was based on the company's steady growth strategy and increasing EBITDA per vehicle.

Margin Stabilization Forecast:Analysts project that Eicher Motors' margins will stabilize around 25.5% by fiscal year 2027.

All-Time High Stock Price (August 26, 2025):Eicher Motors' stock price reached an all-time high of ₹6,109 in intra-day trading on August 26, 2025.

Domestic Wholesale Growth:In July 2025, the Indian automotive sector saw domestic wholesale volumes grow by 9% year-on-year, reaching approximately 1.5 million units.

Retail Volume Contraction:However, retail volumes contracted by 6.5% year-on-year during the same period. This decline was attributed to tepid urban demand and heavy rainfall impacting rural areas.

Anticipated Festive Season Demand:The industry anticipates a significant improvement in retail demand during the upcoming festive season.

companies_no_news.name: ONGC LTD
companies_no_news.text:
No significant corporate developments for ONGC Ltd on . However, on August 25, 2025, ONGC announced the start of natural gas sales from its Chinnewala Tibba field in Rajasthan.

Here is a summary of the announcement regarding the gas monetization:

What was announced:ONGC officially started the sale of natural gas from its Chinnewala Tibba field.

Where is the field located:The Chinnewala Tibba field is part of the Discovered Small Field (DSF-II) block RJ/ONDSF/Chinnewala/2018 in Rajasthan. It is located in Western Rajasthan, near the Indo-Pak international border.

Who is the customer:The gas supplies are being evacuated and sold to Rajasthan Rajya Vidyut Utpadan Nigam Limited (RRVUNL) in Ramgarh.

Quantity:The initial sales volume is 1.0 lakh standard cubic meters per day (LSCMD).

Significance of the development:The move enhances domestic energy production and strengthens India's energy security. The monetization of the field is a step in the company's DSF-II strategy.
